title: Giant ‘Woven’ Fabric Graces The Window Of This Flagship Store
description: Architecture firm LAAB has shared photos the Cozey flagship retail store they designed in Toronto, Canada, that includes an eye-catching window showcase. The design of the window showcase displays a giant fabric weave to draw pedestrians inside the space. The soft fabric design encases the window display, where chosen furniture pieces are displayed on individual […]
author: Erin

title: Sculptural Walls Inspired By The Intricate Detailing Of Indian Temple Architecture
description: Abin Design Studio has shared photos of an interior they designed for a gallery and store that displays Italian furniture in Kolkata, India. The striking interior seamlessly blends the finesse and elegance of Italian craftsmanship with the vibrancy of Indian design traditions. The designers took these traditions and included sculptural walls inspired by the intricate […]

title: World Cities Day 2024: Transforming Urban Futures Through Preservation, Innovation, and Resilience
description: In honor of World Cities Day, which concludes Urban October, this year's theme, "Youth Leading Climate and Local Action for Cities," reflects a growing momentum for sustainable urban solutions championed by local communities and progressive policies. Around the world, cities face intensified demands for resilience, preservation, and innovation as they address challenges from the climate crisis to cultural heritage conservation. These initiatives illustrate a global trend in urban planning, where sustainability, adaptability, and inclusive community priorities take center stage.
author: Nour Fakharany

title: DJ Residence / Ayoub Architects
description: DJ Residence is situated on a picturesque hilly land, beautifully dominated by clusters of oak trees. It was strategically embedded in the open spaces between the trees, resulting in a captivating arrangement of indoor and outdoor spaces. The oak trees, present at various levels in the beautifully landscaped garden, serve as gentle anchors for the suspended mass.
author: Miwa Negoro

title: Surfacedesign "celebrates material reuse" at San Francisco waterfront park
description: Local landscape design studio Surfacedesign has completed Bayfront Park waterfront park in San Francisco using steel elements from a recently demolished portion of the Oakland Bay Bridge. Located along the eastern shore of the Mission Bay neighbourhood, the park was constructed in a formal industrial site across from the city's Chase Center arena. title: Reyes Ríos + Larraín Arquitectos extends pink beach house along narrow Yucatán property
description: Local studio Reyes Ríos + Larraín Arquitectos stretched out a beach house along a narrow plot and coated it with rose-coloured stucco on the Yucatán Peninsula in Mexico.
